verses.name: Genesis 19:22
verses.text: Haste thee, escape thither; for I cannot do any thing till thou be come thither. Therefore the name of the city was called Zoar.

verses.name: Genesis 19:23
verses.text: The sun was risen upon the earth when Lot entered into Zoar.

verses.name: Genesis 19:24
verses.text: Then the Lord rained upon Sodom and upon Gomorrah brimstone and fire from the Lord out of heaven;

verses.name: Genesis 19:25
verses.text: And he overthrew those cities, and all the plain, and all the inhabitants of the cities, and that which grew upon the ground.

verses.name: Genesis 19:26
verses.text: But his wife looked back from behind him, and she became a pillar of salt.
